Grade Configuration

 

  • Grade Configuration
    • Filters
    • Creating a Grade
    • Editing a Grade 
      • Field Description

Grade Configuration enables the user to specify store ranking based on certain KPIs. This ranking is applicable for an item category. This configuration is used in prioritizing the allocation across stores. By using grades, stores can be grouped to manage the process of planning/allocation. The system admin will use this page to create a new grade or edit an existing grade.

For example,

Grade - A Description - All stores with sales more than $100k;

Grade - B Description - All stores with sales more than $75k and less than $100k and so on.

 

 

Filters

The grade configuration filters are:

  • Grade Id
  • Description

Creating a Grade

To create a new grade:

 

  1. Select Menu > Configuration > Grade Configuration 
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Click Create to view the Grade window.
  4.  Enter the Grade Identifier.
  5.  Enter the Description of the grade.
  6. Click Save.

Editing a Grade 

To edit grade:

 

Swipe-out List

  1. Select Menu > Configuration > Grade Configuration
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Select the required grade record. Swipe-out the menu on the required record card and select Edit.
  4. In the Grade window, modify the required fields.
  5. Click Save to save the modified grade details.

Edit View

  1. Select the required grade record card. The action buttons are displayed in the footer section.
  2. Click Edit to view the Grade window to modify the required information.
Field Description

Following are the field descriptions of the attributes available on the screen.

 

Field

 

Description

 
Grade Id

The grade identifier.
Description The description of the grade.

 

Action Buttons

Following are the action buttons available on the screen.

 

Select All Rows Selects all the rows of records on the screen.
Export Exports the list of grade attributes, the file will be downloaded onto your system. View Export for more information.
Create Opens the Grade window. 
Deselect Clears the selected records.
Edit Opens the relevant Grade window to modify the created records.
